--- 
title: "How to sum in Go"
publishedAt: 2021-01-01
summary: "Sum two numbers is one of the most difficult things in programming. Let's see how to do it in Go."
---

# Example with code

There is the code block:
```go
  package main

  func sum(a, b int) int {
    return a + b
  }

  func main() {
    println(sum(1, 2))
  }
```

## Conclusion

This is how you do a sum in Go.
